forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. High 16C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain likely. High around 60F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 9C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 49F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 3C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 37F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 12C. Winds NNE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 53F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low around 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine. High 57F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.
